content: ws knit 4 purl to the last 4 stitches knit 4 row 12 rs knit to the end repeat row 11 and 12 until the body of the sweater measures 4 ½ 5 5 ½ 6 ½ 7 8 10 inches from the underarm hem row 13 ws knit to the end row 14 rs knit to the end work row 13 and 14 2 2 2 3 3 3 3 times total bind off knit wise taiga hilliard designs ©taiga hilliard all rights reserved 2015 this pattern is for personal use only you can print this pattern but cannot distribute by hardcopy or electronically for free or for sale page 2 sleeves note - work each sleeve separately in the round and place a start of round marker 24 26 29 31 34 36 38 stitches leave a 6 tail so you can sew close the hole under each arm short sleeves round 1 knit to the end work round 1 3 3 4 4 4 5 5 times total go to the edging section long sleeves round 1 knit to the end repeat round for 1 round 2 knit 1 k2tog knit to the last 3 stitches ssk knit 1 work rounds 1 and 2 2 2 2 2 2 3 3 times total 20 22 25 27 30 30 32 stitches repeat round 1 until the sleeve measures 4 4 ½ 5 6 6 ½ 7 ½ 9 ½ inches from the under arm or to desired length go to the edging section edging section round 3 purl to the end round 4 knit to the end work rounds 3 and 4 2 2 2 3 3 3 3 times total bind off purl wise repeat as worked for the 2nd sleeve finishing weave in your end block and enjoy taiga hilliard designs ©taiga hilliard all rights reserved 2015 this pattern is for personal use only you can print this pattern but cannot distribute by hardcopy or electronically for free or for sale page 3
